During this weekly teen-led study group  participants will take a practice AMC 10 under test conditions for 75 minutes and then go over the answers and select solutions. Participants must be in 9th or 10th grade  be enrolled in an honors math class and have taken the AMC 8 or 10 last year. This group will meet on October 16 and 23  November 6 and 27  December 4  11  and 18  January 22 and 29  February 5 and 12.

Annual Piano Recital
A discussion of the history of Israel. For today's topics see northshoreflashpoints.blogspot.com.
EQUIPMENT: *VGA Cable - *Projection Screen - *PC Laptop - *HDMI Cable - *Chairs - *Ceiling-Mounted Projector - *6' Tables on Wheels

DESCRIPTION:
Due to high demand we offer TWO yoga sessions. Attend either the 9:30 session or the 11:00 session. Space in each session is limited to the first 64 people.

Yoga instructor Olga Rudiak leads a series of yoga sessions for improved physical strength relaxation and mental clarity. Exercises are done in a chair or standing not on the floor.
